text: @WhiteHouse @GowdyBoogaloo Chief coronavirus task force. Dr. Anthony Fauci said Friday that Americans may soon have to carry a certificate of immunity to the coronavirus. Are you kidding? Sounds like the start of Socialism and control! People start voicing!! #STOP5G#STOPINFORCEMENTOFVACCINATIONS
